code: import axios from'../config/axios';export var asyncGetAllBills=function asyncGetAllBills(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/bills',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(getAllBills(result.reverse()));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var getAllBills=function getAllBills(bills){return{type:'GET_ALL_BILLS',payload:bills};};export var asyncGetBill=function asyncGetBill(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/bills/".concat(id),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(getBill(result));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var getBill=function getBill(bill){return{type:'GET_BILL',payload:bill};};export var asyncAddBill=function asyncAddBill(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/bills',formData,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(addBill(result));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var addBill=function addBill(bill){return{type:'ADD_BILL',payload:bill};};export var asyncDeleteBill=function asyncDeleteBill(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/bills/".concat(id),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;dispatch(deleteBill(result._id));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var deleteBill=function deleteBill(id){return{type:'DELETE_PRODUCT',payload:id};};
